review_content: I have zero (pardon the pun!) exposure to these styles. Looks like beer; aromas of sweet and funky/grassy malts. Not really confidence-inspiring. Palate is dry, sound, but really little flavour. Asashi-like dryness to finish. Will try others.

Can 355 ml can as Hite Free 0.00%. Golden color with bad white foam. Sweet and malty aroma, candies, malt syrup, malt flavor. Taste: sweet, lollipops, malt syrup, honey, a little lemon (citric acid) , soda drink, sadness.

0.355 can imported from Korea
Honey/Apple aroma
Tastes like grass with some hints of paper. Obviously, watery/ Foam surprisingly tastes nice, but disappears quickly. 
Meh.
330ml. can in Mae Kasa, Thailand. Pours a fine golden yellow with short-lasting head. Aroma of corn, cardboard.Taste of cardboard, resin, sweetish. Par for the course zero-alcohol beer.

F: medium size, white, quick disappear.
C: pale gold, clear.
A: malt, hint of apple, grainy, hint of papery.
T: malt, papery, envelope glue, light apple, light body, medium carbonation, not enjoyed, 355ml can from E-Mart near Incheon airport in Seoul.
355ml can from an Asian food shop. Pours gold with no head. Sweet and papery aroma. Taste is envelope glue and paper. Very bad stuff.
If you have to drink just one beer in Korea, than I recommend you this beer.

입안에서 톡톡! 터지는 공기방울의 강도는 지금까지 마셔본 그어떤 맥주보다 강령하고 시원 했습니다! 
하이트맥주맛을 모사한 맛은 옥수수차의 은은하고 부드러운질감과 곡물에서 오는 단맛느낌, 홉은 아로마 보다는 씁쓸한 비터를 주어 전반적으로 드라이하고 깔끔하게 마실 수 있게 해 줍니다.

재료 : 정재수,맥아,홉,합성착향료(맥주향),아세걸팜칼륨(합성감미료),비타민C, 젖산,사과산,구연산Na(나트륨),L-알리닌,카라멜색소
fizzy yellow colour, smell is appley, gluey. taste is the same, thin. totally horrible. leaves a very bad aftertaste that continues into other drinks.

330ml can (Random corner shop, Seoul) as "Hite Zero 0.00"

Smells like a Malta. Tastes like ’Oh, fuck’. Very watery, sweet, thin, fizzy, papery. Papery in the extreme. Walpaper paste finish, like I just licked 20 envelopes. Watery, fizzy. Find it hard to believe this is fermented, so maybe not rateable?

One of best beers in Korea. The aroma is awesome, it reminds me the summer night in Hawaii (since I’ve never been there) Appearance is also wonderful, which looks like rainbow-unicorn’s golden glattering urine. Easy to drink, tastes like heaven. Also don’t forget even children can drink this- It’s like nektar! Elixir!!- 
Overall-This is freaking total legend.

Can. Pours a pale yellow color. Nose is very much like a lager, but reasonably intense, which surprised me. Has some corn elements and just a little bit of sweetness in the smell. Taste is extremely light and devoid of substance - slight bit of sweetness, but not much to it.
